messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule for pushing combat rolls?
There is no option to push combat rolls (either Fighting or Firearms).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should monsters and non-player characters do if their priority is to escape?
They should only use dodge.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What makes excellent improvised weapons?
Frying pans.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are combat rolls resolved?
Combat is resolved with a sequence of rolls.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the default mode for monsters and non-player characters in combat?
to fight back rather than dodge
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be used as improvised weapons?
frying pans, swinging pool cues, throwing bottles, hitting each other with barstools
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When should non-player characters use the dodge action?
when their priority is to escape
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What method can be used to determine the presence of an improvised weapon?
a Luck roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be considered deadly in an office?
Computer monitors, power cables, and scissors
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can a player's goal be resolved in a maneuver?
A maneuver can resolve a goal such as disarming an opponent or knocking them over
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to resolve a goal other than inflicting physical harm?
A maneuver or a Luck roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll can be used to determine the presence of an improvised weapon?
A Luck roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the recommended approach to players' improvised ideas?
Encourage players to improvise and don't block their ideas without good reason.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the success of a fighting maneuver?
A maneuver can be resolved with a Luck roll, or with a comparison of builds to gauge the relative might of opponents.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of opponent can a small, skillful fighter unbalance or disarm?
A larger opponent.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What factors are already factored into each character's Build?
Size and Strength.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the action taken by Old Man Birch in the first round of the fight?
Old Man Birch tries to punch the intruder.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does Old Man Birch go first in the first round of the fight?
Old Man Birch has the higher DEX and therefore goes first.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines who goes first in a fight between Harvey and Old Man Birch?
Old Man Birch has the higher DEX.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill does Harvey use to avoid Old Man Birch's punch?
Harvey uses his Dodge skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What action does Old Man Birch take in the first round of the fight?
Old Man Birch swings a fist at Harvey.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome of Harvey's attempt to dodge Old Man Birch's punch?
Harvey ducks.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill will the Keeper roll against Old Man Birch?
Old Man Birch's Fighting (Brawl) skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome of the Keeper's roll for Old Man Birch's Fighting (Brawl) skill?
An Extreme success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What level of success does Harvey require to avoid the blow?
An Extreme level of success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome of Harvey's roll for his Dodge skill?
A Regular success
